name: Blackberry Gin and Tonic
description: Blackberries and lime form the backbone of this simple gin-based summer sipper.
recipeIngredient: 8 ripe blackberries, plus 2 more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle the blackberries and lime juice in the bottom of a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and add simple syrup and gin. Shake vigorously for about 10 seconds.

Fill a Collins glass with ice. Double-strain into serving glass using a cocktail strainer and mini fine-mesh strainer to prevent the blackberry seeds from going into the glass. Add tonic water and stir gently. Garnish with a few blackberries on a skewer.
